findings.title: Activity (ind. bankingapp. android. framework. activity. ActivatorActivity) is not Protected. An intent-filter exists.
findings.description: A  Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.
findings.recommendation: It is recommended to set the protection level to signature, so only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

findings.title: Activity (com. google. zxing. client. android. CaptureActivity) is not Protected. An intent-filter exists.
findings.description: A  Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.
findings.recommendation: It is recommended to set the protection level to signature, so only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

findings.title: Broadcast Receiver (ind. bankingapp. android. framework. gcm. CustomGCMBroadcastReceiver) is protected by a custom permission.
findings.description: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be protected by a custom defined permission. The permission can be obtained by malicious apps installed prior to this one. More info at \url{https://github.com/commonsguy/cwac-security/blob/master/PERMS.md}
findings.recommendation: Failing to protect components could leave them vulnerable to attack by malicious apps.The component should be reviewed for vulnerabilities, such as injection and information leakage.

findings.description: A  Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Service is explicitly exported.
findings.recommendation: It is recommended to set the protection level to signature, so only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
